Articles.Content:
Pics are gone :S

**Edited <time datetime="2020-03-05T02:37:01Z" title="03/05/2020 02:37  AM" data-short="4 yr">March 5, 2020</time> by Hydrazine\_Soup**
Very nice, Dani! I should try something like this someday.
What's the mod that adds the Voyager prove called? Just want to know

> 
> What's the mod that adds the Voyager prove called? Just want to know

I made it with **Procedural Parts**, and the **Remote tech** antennas.

The rest is stock

You could also use DMagic Orbital Science. It has a magnetometer boom.

![Iq8GBKs.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Iq8GBKs.jpg)

So, where is the probe now? Rest in pieces? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> 
> lajoswinkler said:
> 
> 
> You could also use DMagic Orbital Science. It has a magnetometer boom.
> 
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/Iq8GBKs.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Iq8GBKs.jpg)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> So, where is the probe now? Rest in pieces? ![:D](//s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/kerbal-forum-uploads/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 

Collided into Laythe but I've sent Voyager II to replace it.

**Edited <time datetime="2020-03-05T02:36:39Z" title="03/05/2020 02:36  AM" data-short="4 yr">March 5, 2020</time> by Hydrazine\_Soup**

Nice. The last time I attempted a voyager clone ended horribly.

However...

Inner rocky planets? Don't you mean moons? It's in one of the slides and now that I thought about it it's starting to annoy me.

> 
> Nice. The last time I attempted a voyager clone ended horribly.
> However...
> 
> Inner rocky planets? Don't you mean moons? It's in one of the slides and now that I thought about it it's starting to annoy me.

Hmmm, Yea, I just rewrote that, I usually refer to the inner three as moons and to Bop and Pol as moonlets, Dunno what went by my mind when I wrote that lel
